description.value: Moderate Boon: You draw on the power of midnight to guide you on your journeys. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Darkvision]{Darkvision}. If you already had darkvision, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Darkness]{Darkness} once per day as a divine innate spell.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Gods and Magic
